verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARG1: he will meet North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore next month] .
President Trump announced Thursday he [V: will] meet North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in Singapore next month .
President Trump announced Thursday [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: meet] [ARG1: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] [ARGM-TMP: next month] .
